p: A randomized, double‐blind, placebo‐controlled, escalating single‐dose study with Rolontis was conducted in 40 healthy Korean subjects. Doses of Rolontis ranged from 5 to 350 μg/kg. Rolontis showed dose‐dependent pharmacokinetic properties, and the area under the effect‐time curve (AUEC last) of both the absolute neutrophil count (ANC) and the CD34 + cell count increased as the dose increased 12.
